sn48.56:1.1: “Ekadhamme patitthitassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pancindriyani bhavitani honti subhavitani.
sn48.56:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cittam rakkhati asavesu ca sasavesu ca dhammesu.
sn48.56:1.6: Tassa cittam rakkhato asavesu ca sasavesu ca dhammesu saddhindriyampi bhavanaparipurim gacchati.
sn48.56:1.11: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, ekadhamme patitthitassa bhikkhuno pancindriyani bhavitani honti subhavitani”ti.
